author: Jeremy Trottier, USA TODAY
title: Taysom Hill (chest) returns to practice on Thursday after last week's injury
text:
Jeremy Trottier | USA TODAY Sports The New Orleans Saints seem to have gotten multiple of their players back Thursday, including Taysom Hill, who returned to practice after a Week 2 chest injury and a DNP at Wednesday's practice. This is good news as Dennis Allen had said yesterday his hope was to get Hill on the practice field in at least a limited capacity .
One day after Marshon Lattimore returned to practice, the Saints got back Hill, who is a critical component in their offense. He was used primarily in a blocking role last week but we all know what his talents truly are.
We will get further information when the official injury report releases later Thursday afternoon as to whether or not this was a limited practice for Hill or a full practice. The assumption would be the prior, but any status update that results in positive momentum towards him playing Sunday against the Philadelphia Eagles is a great sign.
More! Blake Grupe ranks among the best kickers in the NFL with this advanced metric

author: Paul Byrne
title: Terrified family feared they'd die when Storm Gerrit tornado ripped house to pieces - Mirror Online
text:
A family yesterday told how they feared they were going to die as a tornado ripped their home to pieces.
Gareth and Lyndsey Moody and three of their children had a lucky escape when the twister struck shortly before midnight on Wednesday. They scrambled to safety over bricks, timber and slates after the tornado ripped off their roof and sent rubble plunging into their rooms. The home was one of 100 damaged in ­Stalybridge, Greater Manchester , as Storm Gerrit brought havoc to parts of the UK.
Three men died yesterday after a 4x4 vehicle they were in plunged into the River Esk near Glaisdale on the North York Moors The storm caused travel chaos with roads closed and ferries and flights cancelled, while 1,500 homes were still without power last night. Gareth and Lyndsey, both 45, were in bed when the twister hit.
Mum-of-four Lyndsey, an A&E nurse, said: “We were lucky to get out alive. We could be dead. The house started shaking. I went to the window, it was like it was sucking in and out. The whole ceiling came down. I screamed, the hallway gave way. The chimney came down and took out the rest of the house.”
Council licensing officer Gareth added: “I went downstairs and heard a loud crash. The lights went out and there was another loud crash. It was mayhem. I ran back upstairs and saw a huge hole in the landing.” Two of the couple’s sons, Jack, 22, and Thomas, 15, were in their bedrooms when the roof and chimney collapsed.
It smashed into Jack’s bedroom and destroyed the bathroom, flooding the kitchen. Gareth said: “How they are alive I don’t know. We were clambering over stuff to get out.” Daughter, Rebecca Saycell, 20, and husband Thomas, 27, were in their bedroom in the basement. They managed to flee with their dogs , Phoebe and Penny and cat Jessica.
Across Stalybridge the tornado ripped off roof tiles, uprooted trees, knocked down walls and sent debris flying into parked cars. Resident Peter Hall was shocked to find a tree had landed on the windscreen of his car. Hayley McCaffer, from the nearby village of Carrbrook, said: “Some of the houses are a disaster, the roof missing, gable ends gone, cars squished.” The Met Office said a “supercell thunderstorm” had caused the damage.
Lib Dem transport spokeswoman Wera Hobhouse urged Rishi Sunak to call a Cobra meeting to tackle the chaos in the area. Around 1,500 properties in ­ Scotland were still without electricity yesterday. Heavy snow, high winds and rain, downed power lines. Some households will not be reconnected until later today.
A string of train ­operators, including LNER and Avanti West Coast, suspended or axed services. Ferries between Dover and France were delayed and Heathrow Airport cancelled 18 flights on Wednesday. The fastest wind gusts were 86mph at Inverbervie, Scotland, 84mph at Fair Isle in ­Shetland, and 83mph at Capel Curig, North Wales. The Met Office warned of more strong winds and rain today and tomorrow. And police urged people in affected areas to only travel if necessary.

author: Thomas Hommel
title: Was einen niedergelassenen Diabetologen an der Klinikreform nervt
text:
„Voll den Bock geschossen“
Was einen niedergelassenen Diabetologen an der Klinikreform nervt
Die Krankenhausreform beschäftigt viele Ärzte und Ärztinnen. Der Diabetologe Christian Klepzig aus Hessen hat der Ärzte Zeitung erzählt, was ihn an der Reform stört – und worauf er hofft.

author: Almudena Martínez-Fornés
title: Casa Real: La Princesa Leonor será recibida con honores de Jefe de Estado en Portugal
text: Casa Real La Princesa Leonor será recibida con honores de Jefe de Estado en Portugal Rebelo de Sousa impondrá la máxima condecoración, la Gran Cruz de la Orden de Cristo, a la Heredera de la Corona Enviada especial a Lisboa Actualizada 06:45 La Princesa de Asturias realiza este viernes su primera visita oficial al exterior, que tiene como destino Portugal. Doña Leonor hará un viaje muy parecido al que hicieron sus padres, Don Felipe y Doña Letizia, en 2012, cuando aún eran Príncipes, aunque su programa se ha adaptado al perfil de una joven de 18 años. Igual que ellos entonces, la Heredera de la Corona será recibida con los máximos honores, los mismos que se reservan a los Jefes de Estado que visitan el país vecino. Además, el presidente de Portugal, Marcelo Rebelo de Sousa, impondrá a Doña Leonor la Gran Cruz de la Orden de Cristo, que es la máxima condecoración que otorga el país vecino. También será la primera vez que la Princesa reciba honores durante la despedida en el Pabellón de Estado del aeropuerto de Barajas Adolfo Suárez. Con el ministro y el jefe de la Casa Doña Leonor viaja acompañada por el ministro de Asuntos Exteriores, José Manuel Albares, y por el jefe de la Casa del Rey, Camilo Villarino. A su llegada al aeropuerto de Lisboa será recibida por un cordón de honor y por los embajadores de Portugal en España, João Mira Gomes, y el de España en Portugal, Juan Fernández Trigo. Desde el aeropuerto, la Princesa se trasladará al Real Monasterio de los Jerónimos para rendir homenaje al poeta Luís Vaz de Camões (1524-80), ceremonia con la que empiezan sus visitas los altos dignatarios que llegan a Lisboa. En este templo contrajo matrimonio la hermana de Don Juan Carlos, la Infanta Doña Pilar, en 1967, cuando la Familia Real vivía en el exilio en Portugal. Escoltada por caballos Tras ser recibida por el prior de Santa María de Belém, José Manuel Dos Santos, la Princesa hará una ofrenda ante el túmulo del poeta, firmará en el libro de honor y visitará el monasterio antes de trasladarse en coche, escoltada por un escuadrón de caballería, al Palacio de Belém, donde la recibirá el presidente de Portugal con los máximos honores, y la Princesa pasará revista a un cordón de honor por primera vez. La Heredera la Corona mantendrá un encuentro con Rebelo de Sousa, en el que ella estará acompañada por el ministro, el jefe de la Casa del Rey y el embajador español, mientras que el presidente portugués acudirá con uno de sus ministros, la jefe de su Casa Civil y su embajador en España. Palabras en los brindis Tras el encuentro, Rebelo de Sousa ofrecerá un almuerzo a la Princesa en el que ella pronunciará unas palabras durante el brindis y, después, su anfitrión, le responderá. Después del almuerzo, Doña Leonor visitará el Oceanário de Lisboa, donde estará acompañada por el presidente de Portugal. La Princesa visitará las instalaciones del impresionante acuario y museo de biología marina y asistirá a una mesa redonda sobre Defensa del Océano, Expediciones científicas y Políticas oceánicas y economía. Con esta visita terminará la primera visita oficial de la Princesa, que tiene previsto emprender regreso a Madrid esta misma tarde.

author: @Midilibre
title: JO Paris 2024 : les Bleus du rugby à 7 trop courts face aux Fidji, ils affronteront la meilleure équipe du monde en quart de finale
text:
JO Paris 2024 : les Bleus du rugby à 7 trop courts face aux Fidji, ils affronteront la meilleure équipe du monde en quart de finale
L’équipe de France de rugby à 7 jouait son dernier match de poule contre les doubles champions olympiques fidjiens, ce jeudi 25 juillet, pour la deuxième journée des Jeux.
Qu’importe le résultat, l’équipe de France était qualifiée depuis la veille. Mais en cas de victoire contre les Fidji, dernier match de poule, permettait aux Bleus de se placer au classement pour affronter un adversaire plus faible en quart de finale.
Finalement, les Tricolores se sont inclinés (19-12). Comme la veille, ils n’ont pas montré un visage rassurant. Ce qui est encore moins rassurant, ils affronteront la meilleure équipe du monde en quart de finale, l’Argentine. Le match est à suivre à partir de 21h30.
\ud83d\udd25— francetvsport (@francetvsport)
[#Paris2024]| \ud83e\udd2f Quel essai des Fidjiens pour passer devant les Français au score !
\ud83d\udcfa
[https://t.co/OK0hkyRtsF] [pic.twitter.com/bl8FSXhSPJ] [July 25, 2024]
Bilan de la phase de poules décevant
Les hommes de Jérôme Daret ont ouvert le score grâce à un superbe essai d’Aaron Grandidier. Mais les "Flying Fijians" ont réagi en fin de première période grâce à l’un des meilleurs joueurs du monde, Jerry Tuwai. Juste avant la pause, les coéquipiers de Stephen Parez ont réalisé une séquence défensive admirable. Mi-temps : 5-5.
En deuxième mi-temps, les joueurs du Pacifique prenaient l’avantage grâce à Rasaku (5-12). Les Français se montraient vaillants, mais impuissants, à l’image de ce dernier essai encaissé par Nasova. Le dernier essai de Andy Timo permettait aux siens de terminer sur une bonne note. Bilan de la phase de poule : 1 victoire, 1 nul, 1 défaite.
[France-Argentine aux JO de Paris 2024 : à quelle heure et sur quelle chaîne voir le quart de finale des Bleus du rugby à 7](/2024/07/25/jo-paris-2024-a-quelle-heure-et-sur-quelle-chaine-voir-france-argentine-quart-de-finale-de-rugby-a-7-12102928.php) [JO Paris 2024 : les Bleus se font peur au rugby à 7 contre l’Uruguay, Dupont fait le show et la qualif' est en poche !](/2024/07/24/jo-paris-2024-les-bleus-se-font-peur-au-rugby-a-7-contre-luruguay-dupont-fait-le-show-et-parez-est-decisif-12101040.php) [JO Paris 2024 : pourquoi les épéistes français ont mis 1h40 à rejoindre le Grand Palais, pour leur entraînement ?](/2024/07/25/jo-paris-2024-pourquoi-les-epeistes-francais-ont-mis-1h40-a-rejoindre-le-grand-palais-pour-leur-entrainement-12102586.php) [JO Paris 2024 : "Il y a un petit risque de pluies", inquiétude sur la météo à la veille de la cérémonie d'ouverture](/2024/07/25/jo-paris-2024-il-y-un-petit-risque-de-pluies-inquietude-sur-la-meteo-a-la-veille-de-la-ceremonie-douverture-12102534.php) [REPLAY. JO Paris 2024 : les Bleues du foot réussissent leur entrée, les septistes font sensation… revivez la journée de jeudi](/2024/07/25/direct-jo-paris-2024-dupont-katoto-foppa-les-debuts-du-tir-a-larc-suivez-les-epreuves-en-temps-reel-12100987.php)

author: Cristian Herrera
title: ¿Jubilado o pensionado del IMSS? Infonavit te tiene esta FELIZ NOTICIA
text:
Consejos
¿Jubilado o pensionado del IMSS? Infonavit te tiene esta FELIZ NOTICIA
Gracias al Infonavit, a través de los años los trabajadores del sector formal mexicano han podido comprar vivienda propia sin afectar tanto a su economía
Tarjeta de INAPAM: se SUSPENDEN DESCUENTOS a estos adultos mayores ¿Trabajas el lunes 18 de marzo? Te decimos si te tienen que PAGAR DOBLE o TRIPLE | LFT ¿Cambio en Bienestar o IMSS? Estos adultos mayores tendrán PAGO de PENSIÓN en abril Becas Benito Juárez: ¿Habrá otro pago en 2024 para estudiantes de prepa?
Gracias al Instituto del Fondo Nacional de la Vivienda para los Trabajadores (Infonavit), a través de los años los
trabajadores del sector formal mexicano han podido comprar vivienda propia sin afectar tanto a su economía.
Bajo este entendido, en caso de que un trabajador se haya jubilado o esté próximo a hacerlo, habrá que destacar que la persona, si no usó su crédito del Instituto del Fondo Nacional de la Vivienda para los Trabajadores (Infonavit), puede pedir el dinero correspondiente que se encuentra en la Subcuenta de Vivienda.
Los videos imperdibles
{{title}}
Bajo este contexto, de acuerdo a lo detallado en la página web oficial del Instituto del Fondo Nacional de la Vivienda para los Trabajadores (Infonavit), los siguientes son los requisitos que se deben cumplir para solicitar la resolución de lo acumulado en la Subcuenta de Vivienda:
*Tener ahorro disponible, ya sea en Fondo de Ahorro 72-92, Subcuenta de Vivienda 92, Subcuenta de Vivienda 97 y/o Solo Infonavit.
*Contar con resolución de pensión expedida por el IMSS (en caso de incapacidad debe ser igual o mayor al 50%).
*Estado de cuenta bancario a tu nombre con CLABE, con vigencia no mayor a dos meses; verifica que tu cuenta acepte depósitos por la cantidad a devolver.
*Número de Seguridad Social (NSS), RFC y CURP1; estos datos deben coincidir exactamente con los que aparecen en el IMSS, tu Afore y en el estado de cuenta bancario.
*No tener un crédito vigente con el Infonavit.
*Estar registrado en una Afore.
Cabe tener en consideración, en este punto, que el ahorro que la persona tiene en la
Subcuenta de Vivienda en el Instituto del Fondo Nacional de la Vivienda para los Trabajadores (Infonavit) corresponde a la suma de los recursos que el trabajador recibió de las aportaciones de parte de sus empleadores, clasificándose de la siguiente manera:
*Fondo de Ahorro 1972-1992: si entre mayo de 1972 y febrero de 1992 recibiste de tu empleador aportaciones por el 5% sobre tu salario diario integrado, cuentas con Fondo de Ahorro.
*Subcuenta de Vivienda 1992: si entre marzo de 1992 y junio de 1997 recibiste de tu empleador aportaciones por el 5% sobre tu salario diario integrado, cuentas con ahorro en tu Subcuenta de Vivienda.
*Subcuenta de Vivienda 1997: si de julio de 1997 a la fecha has recibido aportaciones de tu empleador por el 5% sobre tu salario diario integrado, cuentas con ahorro en tu Subcuenta de Vivienda 1997.
Cabe tener en cuenta que el retiro de los recursos se efectuará considerando la normativa del régimen de la Ley del Seguro Social en el que el jubilados se encuentre, el cual se determina según la fecha en que comenzó a cotizar al Instituto Mexicano del Seguro Social (
IMSS), pudiendo ser Ley 73 o Ley 97.
El trámite para retirar el dinero acumulado en la Subcuenta de Vivienda del Infonavit se puede realizar de forma presencial o desde Mi Cuenta Infonavit.

author: Owen Jenkins
title: Surge in Nuclear Power Investments: Oklo's Stock Soars
text: Surge in Nuclear Power Investments: Oklo's Stock Soars [Owen Jenkins](https://investorshangout.com/profile/view?id=79249)Updated: 10-17-2024 06:03 PM The Rise of Nuclear Power as a Strategic Investment In recent months, there has been a notable shift in the technology and energy sectors, with major players focusing on nuclear power. This surge has been particularly beneficial for companies like Oklo, a nuclear power firm that focuses on next-generation fission technology. Oklo: A Leading Player in Nuclear Innovation Oklo is spearheading efforts to provide affordable, clean energy on a global scale. With its innovative Aurora powerhouse, the company aims to produce electrical power efficiently. Their current capabilities allow production of 15 megawatts of electrical power (MWe), with prospects to scale up to 50 MWe. One remarkable feature of their technology is the extended operational lifespan—these powerhouses can function for up to ten years without needing fuel replacement. Influence of Tech Giants on Nuclear Stock Performance Oklo’s impressive stock performance can be traced back to key agreements in the industry, particularly with tech giant Microsoft. Recently, Microsoft entered into a significant power purchase agreement with Constellation Energy, which revived operations at the Unit 1 reactor at Three Mile Island. This strategic move has been pivotal in boosting confidence in the nuclear sector, driving Oklo's shares up significantly in recent months. Partnerships Driving Growth The collaboration between Microsoft and Constellation Energy to launch the Crane Clean Energy Center (CCEC) is set to produce over 800 MW of carbon-free electricity, further highlighting the critical role nuclear power plays in achieving sustainability goals. As Microsoft commits to purchasing energy from this reactor, it aligns its business strategies with environmental responsibilities, showcasing the potential of nuclear energy to meet future energy needs. Emergence of New Technologies in Nuclear Energy Additionally, the nuclear sector has seen exciting advancements, such as Google’s recent announcement regarding a purchase agreement with Kairos Power for its small modular reactors (SMRs). Google is poised to be among the first companies globally to utilize this type of nuclear technology, expected to come online by the end of the decade, further indicating a shift towards decentralizing energy production. The Future of Nuclear Power Investment As various big tech companies express their commitment to nuclear energy, the investment landscape is shifting dramatically. Such trends not only bolster existing companies like Oklo but also pave the way for new innovations and opportunities in the nuclear energy sector. Frequently Asked Questions What factors contributed to Oklo's stock surge? Oklo's stock surged due to increased interest in nuclear power, driven by partnerships with Microsoft and Constellation Energy, highlighting the strategic importance of nuclear energy. How does Oklo's technology compare to traditional nuclear power? Oklo's technology focuses on smaller, scalable powerhouses that are designed to operate longer without fuel changes, making them more efficient than traditional nuclear facilities. What role do major companies play in the nuclear sector? Major companies like Microsoft and Google are influencing the nuclear energy market by investing in innovative technologies and forming agreements, which enhances the visibility and credibility of the sector. Why is nuclear energy gaining popularity among tech companies? Nuclear energy is being embraced for its potential to provide stable and carbon-free power, aligning with the sustainability goals of tech companies while meeting rising energy demands. What are the future prospects for Oklo? With increasing investments and strategic partnerships, Oklo is poised for growth as the demand for clean and sustainable energy solutions continues to rise globally. Energy, Oil & Gas
AED Energy pilots thermal battery demonstrator at Nigeria university
LONDON
Wed, 11 Jun 2025
SHARE
Aed Energy, a UK-based developer of next-generation thermal energy storage, has announced a new pilot project at Pan-Atlantic University (PAU) in Lagos, Nigeria, as part of ZE-Gen’s international innovation programme.
Advancing practical solutions to displace fossil fuel generators, the programme supports Aed Energy’s ambitions to accelerate clean energy access across weak-grid regions.
As one of six new ZE-Gen Demonstrator projects funded through Innovate UK, Aed Energy’s pilot tackles a critical challenge: the widespread use of fossil fuel generators across education, healthcare, manufacturing, and remote infrastructure in energy-constrained markets.
Developed with PAU, a leading Lagos-based institution and a local clean energy integrator FaithLink Ltd, the project combines rooftop solar with Aed Energy’s proprietary modular thermal battery. The system stores renewable electricity as high-temperature heat in energy dense composite bricks and delivers dispatchable power or industrial-grade heat for up to 24 hours, without lithium, combustion, or fragile supply chains.
Pan-Atlantic University’s main campus consumes approximately 6,570 MWh of electricity annually - much of which is currently supplied by fossil fuel generators. When run on diesel, this equates to over 1.8 million litres per year - or the equivalent of filling nearly three-quarters of an Olympic swimming pool full of diesel, for one site alone.
Installed on site, Aed Energy’s system marks the start of a shift from fossil fuel dependency to clean, dispatchable energy charged entirely by renewables. Its MWh-scale units are designed for rapid deployment across industrial sites, microgrids, and critical infrastructure where fossil fuel generators remain the default for primary energy supply.
This project is a strategic inflection point for Aed Energy - transitioning the technology from lab-scale development into a live operating environment. It validates the system under real-world conditions and lays the foundation for commercial rollout. As global energy users seek longer-duration alternatives to short-duration battery systems, this deployment will demonstrate how Aed Energy’s platform can deliver clean, reliable baseload power where conventional batteries fall short.
The project is already driving positive economic and global impact. In the UK, it has created three new job roles, contributing to Aed Energy’s growth plans to expand to 15 UK jobs by 2026 and more than 150 globally by 2030. In Nigeria, it is generating an estimated 10–15 local jobs during installation and commissioning.
Commenting on the success of the project, CEO of Aed Energy, Rayan Kassis said: “The Pan Atlantic University Thermal Demonstrator project, funded by the ZE-Gen, is a first step toward proving that affordable, clean baseload energy can be delivered reliably - even in regions still heavily dependent on fossil fuel generators. It moves our technology out of the lab and into the field, showing what’s possible when innovation is paired with local partnerships and real-world demand.”
“We’re proud to be working with Pan-Atlantic University, FaithLink, ZE-Gen, and Innovate UK to deliver a solution that’s not only practical, but scalable. This deployment lays the foundation for clean energy systems that serve critical institutions, power industrial growth, and open up new export opportunities for UK innovation.”
– TradeArabia News Service
